description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fun, fast paced action for you and up to three of your friends.  Pit your skill against boss rounds or take on the endless horde.  Weapon powerups give you the advantage you need against the relentless enemies.
description.short: Fun, fast paced action for you and up to three of your friends.  Pit your skill against boss rounds or take on the endless horde.  Weapon powerups give you the advantage you need against the relentless enemies.
